page_content:
FY2019 GLOBAL CITIZENSHIP ANNUAL REPORT
SUPPLY CHAIN0101  
Looking Forward: Supply Chain
In FY2020, Seagate will be focused on supplier capacity-building by working 
with other like-minded companies in carrying out joint training on key topics. 
We are also looking at conducting focused training on root cause and 
corrective action plan development for our suppliers in various geographies. 
Seagate will continue its involvement on the RBA Senior Executive Advisory 
Council, and will strive for 100 percent completion rates among all identified 
suppliers (direct and indirect) of the RBA SAQ. In addition, we have a goal 
that 100 percent of identified suppliers will complete a third-party RBA VAP  
audit. We are also considering a supplier recognition program to acknowledge  
and celebrate leading CSR practices at supplier facilities.FY2019 Diversity Spend (U.S. Only) $144.9M
